name: Rock Paper Bullsh*t
description:
"It's just a Rock, Paper and Scissors game" they said. And it is in fact, but will that stop you from choosing the easiest way? Test your luck in "Rock Paper Bullsh*t", in which the unfair elements of children playground's imaginary rulebook can be crucial to your strategy! Just remember: you have one chance at a cheating victory.

Will you choose it? "It's only a game, why you have to be mad?"

Instructions:

Click on the button "Run Game".

Commands: drag and drop the card on your side of the field to start a classic rock paper scissors round. After 2 losses, you can click on the button "cheat" to change the cards for more unfair tactics and get an advantage.

This is a prototype for a tabletop/digital card game and while the concept works, some of its features couldn't be tested for lack of multiplayer options.

Engine used: GDevelop
